name: Useless Bazaar Text
pattern: §r§(?:7|c)(?:Claiming order\.\.\.)?(?:Executing instant buy\.\.\.)?(?:Putting (?:coins|goods) in escrow\.\.\.)?(?:Checking escrow for recent transaction\.\.\.)?(?:Submitting (?:buy|sell) (?:order|offer)\.\.\.)?(?:The sell orders for this item changed too much!)?(?:Couldn't match the quoted price!)?(?:Seems like a volatile market!)?§r

name: Hype Text
pattern: (§r)*  §r§f§l➤ §r§6You have reached your Hype limit! Add Hype to Prototype Lobby minigames by right-clicking with the Hype Diamond!§r
